allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add HR Documents page with The Way it Workx content

- Add full content from The Way it Workx PDF \(employee handbook\)
- Include all chapters: Start, Lunch, Werkplek, Team, Ontwikkelen, 
  Veilig Werken, Vrije Dagen, Waarneming, Beloning, Financieel Gezond
- Integrate Toelichting Bonusregeling with visual examples
- Add Bijlagen section with references to Basenet documents

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add books icon for The Way it Workx in sidebar

- Add stacked books icon to Icons component
- Rename HR Documenten to The Way it Workx
- Add books hover animation \(stack wobble effect\)
- Fix filetext hover class name

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
